All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Atlantis
Atlantis style for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
Blue
Blue type for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
Character
Character class is an implementation product for the abstract factory.
CharacterComponentFactory
CharacterComponentFactory is an abstract factory implementation to create character objects' components
Collidable
Collidable class is an super class of products.
ComponentFactory
Interface to generate abstract component factories.
Enemy
Enemy class is an implementation product for the abstract factory.
EnemyComponentFactory
EnemyComponentFactory is an abstract factory implementation to create character objects' components
GamePanel
GamePanel is used to display whole panel of the game and, log messages.
Green
Green type for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
Helper
Helper class is used to locate constants
Logger
Static class to log everything throughout the gameplay.
Main
Main class starts the game
Red
Red type for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
Sprite
Abstract class used for keeping track of images ,setting their locations and drawing images
Style
A product abstract class to generate collidable objects within abstarct factory.
Tile
Tile objects helps to represent a tile in our board.
Tile.Color
Enum class to represent colors
TileManager
TileManager class is responsible for manage creation, animation, shuffle, collision detection with collidable objects.
Type
A product abstract class to generate collidable objects within abstarct factory.
Underwild
Underwild style for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
Valhalla
Valhalla style for collidable objects it only be created with componentfactories
